metadata.test_suite: Foco Project Management - Complete User Journey Testing
metadata.purpose: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of all features using browser automation

existing_user.purpose: Test all features with pre-existing data

new_user.purpose: Test complete onboarding and feature creation from scratch

instructions.overview: This JSON contains a complete testing journey for Foco Project Management. You will use @browser to navigate to foco.mx and perform TWO complete test runs: one with an existing account and one with a newly created account.
execution_order: Run Journey 2 with new user (create account first)
Compare results and report any discrepancies
instructions.reporting: For each step, report: ✅ PASS, ❌ FAIL, or ⚠️ PARTIAL. Include screenshots for failures.

instructions: Open browser and navigate to https://foco.mx
Verify hero section displays with gradient background
Verify heading 'Concéntrate en lo que importa' is visible
Check for 'Comenzar gratis' and 'Ver Demo' buttons
Verify navigation bar is present with logo
steps.expected_result: Homepage loads with premium design, gradient background, proper text sizing, no overlapping elements
steps.validation: Hero section should be mobile responsive, no hydration errors in console

steps.expected_result: Successfully logs in and redirects to /dashboard
steps.validation: No 401 errors, no authentication failures, session token set

instructions: Check for sidebar with navigation items
Verify AI Project Creator button is present
steps.expected_result: Dashboard displays with all UI elements, no loading errors
steps.validation: No console errors, all projects load from database (no mock data)

instructions: Enter description: 'Automated test project for comprehensive testing'
Set end date: 30 days from today
Wait for project to appear in list
steps.expected_result: Project created successfully, appears in project list
steps.validation: Project saved to database, no errors, redirects to project detail or updates list

instructions: Click on the newly created project
Check project name, description, dates are correct
Verify tabs: Overview, Tasks, Milestones, Analytics, Settings
Check for 'Add Task' and 'Add Milestone' buttons
steps.expected_result: Project detail page displays all information correctly
steps.validation: All data matches what was entered, no missing fields

instructions: Click 'Add Task' or navigate to Tasks tab
Enter description: 'This is a test task'
Set due date: 7 days from today
Verify task appears in task list
steps.expected_result: Task created and visible in task list
steps.validation: Task saved to database, all fields populated correctly

instructions: Add a comment: 'Started working on this task'
steps.expected_result: Task updates successfully, changes visible immediately
steps.validation: Database updated, no errors, real-time update if applicable

instructions: Check if completion date is set
steps.expected_result: Task marked as completed with timestamp
steps.validation: Completed tasks filtered/moved appropriately, analytics updated

instructions: Verify task is removed from active list
Verify task appears in archived list
steps.expected_result: Task archived successfully and accessible in archive
steps.validation: Task status updated in database, can be unarchived if needed

instructions: Set target date: 15 days from today
steps.expected_result: Milestone created and visible
steps.validation: Milestone saved to database with correct data

instructions: Create or select existing tasks to add
Add at least 2 tasks to the milestone
steps.expected_result: Tasks linked to milestone, progress calculated
steps.validation: Milestone-task relationship stored, progress percentage accurate

instructions: Check for metric cards: Total Projects, Active Projects, Completed Tasks, etc.
Verify NO mock data is displayed (all data should be real)
Check for charts: project progress, task completion over time
Verify mobile responsiveness - no overlapping elements
Test on mobile viewport if possible
steps.expected_result: Analytics display real data, fully responsive, no overlapping
steps.validation: All numbers match actual project/task counts, charts render correctly

instructions: Set target date: 90 days from today
Add metrics or KPIs if available
Verify goal appears in goals list
Check that NO mock data is shown
steps.expected_result: Goal created with real data, no mock goals visible
steps.validation: Goal saved to database, analytics show real goal progress

steps.expected_result: Goal progress updated and reflected in UI
steps.validation: Progress saved, analytics updated, no calculation errors

instructions: Check that invitation appears in pending list
steps.expected_result: Invitation sent successfully
steps.validation: Email sent (if email service configured), invitation recorded in database

steps.expected_result: Organization created successfully
steps.validation: Organization saved, user is owner, can manage settings

instructions: Create a new task: 'Time Tracking Test'
Click 'Start Timer' or time tracking button
Verify time logged is approximately 1 minute
Add time entry description: 'Testing time tracking'
steps.expected_result: Time tracked accurately and saved
steps.validation: Time entry stored in database, appears in time reports

instructions: Verify report displays with real data (no mock data)
Check mobile responsiveness of report cards
steps.expected_result: Reports generate with real data, export works, mobile responsive
steps.validation: All report data accurate, PDF contains correct information

instructions: Refresh page and verify settings persisted
steps.expected_result: Settings updated and persisted
steps.validation: Database updated, changes reflected across app

instructions: Look for AI chat icon or assistant button
Click to open AI chat interface
Send message: 'Help me plan a software development project'
Verify response is relevant and uses OpenAI (not Ollama)
Test another query: 'Suggest tasks for a marketing campaign'
Check if AI suggestions can be applied to projects
steps.expected_result: AI responds with helpful, relevant suggestions using OpenAI
steps.validation: No Ollama references, responses are coherent, can interact naturally

instructions: Click 'AI Project Creator' button if available
If shows 'Feature integration in progress' message, verify that message
If functional, enter project description: 'Build an e-commerce website with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration'
Wait for AI to create project structure
Verify project, milestones, and tasks are created
Check that generated content makes sense
steps.expected_result: AI generates logical project structure or shows migration notice
steps.validation: If functional: project structure is coherent. If not: clear message about OpenAI migration

instructions: Use search bar to search for 'Test Project'
Clear filters and verify all projects return
steps.expected_result: Search and filters work accurately
steps.validation: Results match filter criteria, no items missing or extra

instructions: Verify all project columns display correctly
Verify projects organized by status in columns
Drag a project to different status column
Verify timeline displays with project durations
Check for overlapping or rendering issues
steps.expected_result: All views render correctly, Kanban drag-drop works, Gantt shows timeline
steps.validation: View switching smooth, data consistent across views

instructions: Verify it's removed from favorites list
steps.expected_result: Favorites add/remove functionality works
steps.validation: Favorites stored per user, persist across sessions

instructions: If available, create a notification trigger (task assignment, mention, etc.)
steps.expected_result: Notification system works, notifications can be marked read
steps.validation: Real-time updates if supported, notification count accurate

instructions: Add comment: 'This is a test comment for verification'
Verify comment appears with timestamp and author
steps.expected_result: Comments can be created, edited, deleted successfully
steps.validation: Comments stored with proper metadata, real-time updates if applicable

instructions: Select export format: CSV or JSON
Verify data is complete and accurate
steps.expected_result: Export generates valid file with all project data
steps.validation: File format correct, all fields present, data accurate

instructions: Verify no data corruption or loss
steps.expected_result: Import successful, data intact
steps.validation: Imported data matches original, relationships preserved

instructions: Verify ALL data is real, no 'Sample Project' or fake data
Verify NO mock goals or analytics
Inspect browser console for any 'mock' or 'fake' references
Check network tab for any mock data endpoints
Verify all charts and metrics use real database queries
steps.expected_result: ZERO mock data anywhere in the application
steps.validation: All data comes from database, no hardcoded fake data

instructions: Set browser viewport to mobile (375x667 - iPhone SE)
Navigate to homepage - verify no overlapping elements
Check hero section - text should be readable, gradient visible
Check that icons and text have proper spacing
Verify all buttons are tappable with proper touch targets
steps.expected_result: All pages fully responsive with no overlapping elements
steps.validation: Elements never overlap, proper spacing on all screen sizes

instructions: Try to create project with empty name
Try to set end date before start date
Try to access project that doesn't exist (invalid ID)
steps.expected_result: Appropriate error messages, no crashes
steps.validation: User-friendly errors, app remains stable

instructions: Verify NO 406 errors for users table
Check Network tab for failed requests
Verify all API calls return 200/201 success codes
steps.expected_result: Zero console errors, all API calls successful
steps.validation: Clean console, no warnings or errors during normal use

instructions: Verify all test data cleaned up
steps.expected_result: All test data successfully deleted
steps.validation: Soft delete or hard delete works, data removed from UI and database

instructions: Verify redirected to login or homepage
steps.expected_result: Logout successful, cannot access protected routes
steps.validation: Session terminated, auth tokens cleared

journey_2_new_user.name: Complete Feature Testing - New User Onboarding

account.note: Replace [TIMESTAMP] with actual timestamp when creating account

instructions: Check for email verification if required
Verify redirected to dashboard or organization setup
steps.expected_result: Account created successfully, user logged in
steps.validation: New user in database, session established, no errors

instructions: If prompted for organization setup, fill form:
steps.expected_result: Organization created, user is owner, dashboard accessible
steps.validation: Organization saved, user has admin permissions

instructions: Verify empty state message for projects
Verify analytics show zero data (not mock data)
Verify empty state for goals (not mock data)
steps.expected_result: Proper empty states everywhere, NO mock data shown
steps.validation: Empty states guide user to create content, no fake data

instructions: Click 'Create First Project' or '+ New Project'
- Description: 'Testing project creation as new user'
steps.expected_result: First project created successfully
steps.validation: Project saved, user is owner, can manage project

instructions: Verify all 3 tasks appear in task list
Test drag-drop in Kanban view if available
steps.expected_result: Multiple tasks created, status changes work
steps.validation: All tasks saved, relationships correct, analytics update

instructions: Set target date: 7 days from today
Link Task 1 and Task 2 to this milestone
steps.expected_result: Milestone tracks task completion accurately
steps.validation: Progress calculation correct, updates in real-time

instructions: Verify metrics now show real data:
Verify NO mock data or sample projects
Check that charts render with real data
steps.expected_result: Analytics show actual user data, not mock data
steps.validation: Counts match reality, charts display correctly

instructions: Set target date: 14 days from today
steps.expected_result: Goals system works with real project data
steps.validation: Goal-project linkage works, progress tracked

instructions: Verify invitation shows in pending list
Note: Invited user won't actually receive email unless configured
steps.expected_result: Invitation system functional for new users
steps.validation: Invitation stored, can be resent or cancelled

instructions: Verify changes persist after page refresh
steps.expected_result: User can customize their experience
steps.validation: Settings saved, reflected across application

steps.action: Test AI Features as New User
instructions: Ask: 'What should I do first in Foco?'
Ask: 'Create a task breakdown for building a mobile app'
Verify AI provides relevant task suggestions
Check if suggestions can be imported to project
steps.expected_result: AI provides contextual help for new users
steps.validation: Responses use OpenAI, helpful for onboarding

instructions: Add 5 tasks covering design, development, testing, deployment
Track time on one task (use time tracker)
steps.expected_result: New user can execute full project management workflow
steps.validation: All features accessible and functional for new account

instructions: Dashboard - verify only 2 projects (created by user)
Analytics - verify metrics match actual data
Console - verify no mock data loaded
Database queries - all real user data
steps.expected_result: ZERO mock data for new user account
steps.validation: New users start with clean slate, no sample data

steps.action: Test as New User on Mobile
instructions: Test entire workflow from step 1-12 on mobile
Verify forms are usable on mobile
steps.expected_result: Full functionality on mobile, perfect responsiveness
steps.validation: No UI issues on mobile, all features accessible

instructions: Optionally delete the test user account
steps.expected_result: User can clean up their data
steps.validation: Deletion works, data properly removed

critical_validations.description: These are MUST-PASS criteria across both journeys

requirements.requirement: Zero mock data anywhere in the application
No overlapping elements on any screen size
No React hydration errors in console
requirements.validation: Check console on every page load

requirements.requirement: No 406 Not Acceptable errors for users table
requirements.validation: Monitor Network tab for all API calls

requirements.requirement: No Ollama code or references anywhere
requirements.validation: Search for 'Ollama' in UI, console, network requests

requirements.requirement: Full mobile responsiveness across all pages

requirements.validation: AI responses work, no Ollama errors

requirements.requirement: All data persists correctly across sessions
requirements.validation: Logout, login, verify all data intact

structure.detailed_results: For each step, report: Step number, Category, Action, Result (✅/❌/⚠️), Notes, Screenshot if failed
structure.critical_issues: List all failures from critical_validations section
structure.recommendations: Suggestions for fixes based on failures
structure.comparison: Any differences between Journey 1 (existing user) and Journey 2 (new user)

execution_notes.browser_requirements: Use @browser tool to navigate and interact with foco.mx
execution_notes.screenshot_policy: Take screenshot for every failure or partial pass
execution_notes.timing: Allow adequate time for page loads and API responses
execution_notes.error_handling: If a step fails, note it and continue to next step
execution_notes.console_monitoring: Keep DevTools Console open throughout all tests
execution_notes.network_monitoring: Monitor Network tab for API errors
execution_notes.timestamp_replacement: Replace [TIMESTAMP] with actual Unix timestamp or date string
